WORKSSS !!!!

But with out this crack... All you gotta do is, instead of opening game alone, load it from ollydbg (www.ollydbg.de) , and then find this:

MOV BL,BYTE PTR DS:[15A2D0C]   
CMP BL,BYTE PTR DS:[17B918A]

Create a break point there, and write byte 


00A68009  |. 8A1D CC995C01  MOV BL,BYTE PTR DS:[15C99CC]
00A6800F  |. 3A1D 6AF67D01  CMP BL,BYTE PTR DS:[17DF66A]

Done, game works
